title: Why Next.js over React
subject: Next.js
theory: React is a library for UIs. Next.js is a framework for apps. React needs manual setup for routing, bundling, and SSR. Next.js provides these by default.

common_mistakes.mistake: Using CRA for SEO heavy sites
common_mistakes.correction: CRA is client-side only (bad for SEO). Next.js sends HTML.

interview_questions.question: Why use Next.js instead of Create React App?
interview_questions.answer: Better performance (SSR/SSG), built-in routing, API routes, and SEO optimization.

summary: Next.js solves the 'configuration hell' of React apps.
